Name: Flame Tinkerer
Story Background: Flame Tinkerers are mischievous goblins who harness the power of fire to craft intricate mechanical contraptions.
Ability: When Flame Tinkerer enters the battlefield, you may pay R. If you do, it deals 1 damage to target creature.
Appearance Description: Flame Tinkerer is a small, red-skinned goblin with wild hair, wielding a sputtering torch in one hand and a collection of gears and tools in the other.
